original_title: Genetically Modified Food: Panacea or Poison
overview: In the last thirty years global demand for food has doubled. In a race to feed the planet, scientists have discovered how to manipulate DNA, the blueprint of life, and produce what they claim are stronger, more disease-resistant crops. However, fears that genetically modified food many not be safe for humans or the environment has sparked violent protest.
title: Genetically Modified Food: Panacea or Poison
